title: MINOR COURSE
content: Rn I'm in ECE 4TH sem ... I'm done with DSA in my previous sem... Which one of the other 3 is the easiest to score??

comments.body: Thank you! But how would you prioritize or rank them based on their importance?
DSA is easy to score as well as DBMS, don't take OS that's it you will suffer if you take OS and there's no use of taking OS.

DBMS 

OS is pure pain bcz of theory

PES EC Campus has very few good DBMS teachers. Yes, OS is a theoretical subject but it teaches you a lot of core computer science concepts which would be very useful to you if you want a job in CS later. I'd suggest OS
